sections.summary: senior mechanical / piping designer with over 40 years of progressive design experience in the petrochemical industry. this experience has been gained on a variety of projects; petrochemical, lpg storage facility, polyethylene plants, pipeline pumping and metering stations, pulp & paper mill facilities, sulfur recovery units, storage tanks and fire water systems.
